ygData.subject: Re: bandages

ygData.messageBody:
According to Lim Dul:
> Hey, another question I have for everybody out of curiosity: now that
> specialization has kicked in...what does everybody have in mind for that? I
> would think it the most popular approach to specialize in nuking
> abilities...but would any of you have the need to specialize in something
> else and why? ;)

1st choice: Speciqlise in nukes
2nd choice: Specialise in root/enstill
3rd choice: Specialise in shadow step+gate :)
